pr_title: [DOCS] Update images in Metrics Monitoring doc

timeline.message: [DOCS] Update images in Metrics Monitoring doc

timeline.bodyText:
I know you didn't add it, but the first part of this sentence sounds weird to me. It also seems a bit obvious.

After setting up metrics monitoring and data is streaming to {es}, you can use the {metrics-app} to view metrics from your infrastructure and identify problems in real-time.

I wonder if we can just ax the first half of the sentence and say something like:

Use the {metrics-app} to view metrics from your infrastructure and identify problems in real-time.

Maybe you have a better idea 🤔
timeline.author: bmorelli25
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,11 +2,11 @@
 [role="xpack"]
 == {metrics-app}
 
-After you have <<install-infrastructure-monitoring, started monitoring metrics>> and data is streaming to {es},
+After <<install-infrastructure-monitoring, setting up metrics monitoring>> and data is streaming to {es},
